content.question: The figure above shows the graph of the continuous function <math alttext="g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 8, close bracket" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. Let <math alttext="h" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function defined by <math alttext="h of x equals, the integral from 3 to x, of, g of t, d t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>. On what intervals is <math alttext="h" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> increasing?

choices.label: <math alttext="open bracket, 2 comma 5, close bracket" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> only

<math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 1, close bracket" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open bracket, 3 comma 7, close bracket" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, 1 comma 3, close bracket" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open bracket, 7 comma 8, close bracket" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open bracket, 0 comma 1, close bracket" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="open bracket, 3 comma 7, close bracket" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.5: Interpreting the Behavior of Accumulation Functions Involving Area

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
